name: weather-journal-app
description: This project creates an asynchronous web app that uses a weather web API and input by the user to pass data between client and server-side and dynamically update the UI of the page. Check it out if you want to learn more about setting up a local server, writing GET and POST server and client-side code, and how to use data from an API and from user input to change the content of a web page. Enjoy!
